name: Gotham Stock Exchange
description: A major financial trading hub in Gotham City featured in The Dark Knight Rises.

content.title: History
content.body: The Gotham Stock Exchange is one of the most prominent financial institutions in Gotham City. Established to serve as the city's central hub for trading and finance, it has been a symbol of economic power and influence in the region.

content.title: Geography
content.body: The Gotham Stock Exchange is located in the financial district of Gotham City, surrounded by skyscrapers and bustling with activity. The building itself stands as a towering, modern structure symbolizing the city's economic prowess.

content.title: Notable Features
content.body: The building features a grand trading floor, multiple electronic trading stations, and advanced security systems that monitor the continuous financial activities. Its architecture includes large glass facades and a prominent main entrance that reflects its importance.

content.title: Story Significance
content.body: In 'The Dark Knight Rises,' the Gotham Stock Exchange is the location of a significant heist led by Bane. The scene exemplifies the villain's strategic efforts to cripple Gotham's economy and highlights Bruce Wayne's financial struggles as part of the overarching narrative.
